resources.string: Try to collect four symbols in a row. Whoever does that more often wins. You get the right to make the next move after a certain amount of time since your last one has expired. The game gets faster as it approaches the end. Do not make excess moves because you lose your symbols if you put too many on the board. To play against player on other device use QR codes to connect via WiFi hotspot. Have fun!
There was an issue with sign-in, please try again later.
Failed to sign in. Please check your network connection and try again.

The application is incorrectly configured. Check that the package name and signing certificate match the client ID created in Developer Console. Also, if the application is not yet published, check that the account you are trying to sign in with is listed as a tester account. See logs for more information.
Invite friends to play a game.
See who is inviting you right now.
Click the button as fast as you can!
An error occurred while starting the game. Please try again.
is challenging you to a game!
There was an issue with sign in. Please try again later.
Anyone you invite must be a trusted tester
This rematch has already been started!
This match has locally-modified data. This operation cannot be performed until the match is sent to the server.
Yout opponent has left the game!

 Illustrated by: Igor Ščekić

In development of this game the following MIDI driver is used:
 - https://github.com/billthefarmer/mididriver
 This library is licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0, http://www.apache.org/licenses/
 For generating QR codes QRGenerator library is used:
 - https://github.com/androidmads/QRGenerator
 It is licenced under the MIT license, https://opensource.org/license/mit/
 For reading QR codes QRCodeScanner is used:
 - https://github.com/blikoon/QRCodeScanner
